label: [Vega-Lite] Example Gallery
info:
# Shows Examples from [Vega-Lite Example Gallery](https://vega.github.io/vega-lite/examples/).

- press button of inject node to initialize dropdown menu
- examples are displayed on **Example 3 - Vega-Lite** tab.

name: Fix Data URL
List of Examples
